          text run at (0,20) width 257: "100%, and contains another table, table B."
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,92) size 784x40
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 746x39
          text run at (0,0) width 210: "Table B has two cells, B1 and B2. "
          text run at (209,0) width 240: "B1 has a fixed pixel height of 30 pixels. "
          text run at (448,0) width 158: "B2 has a height of 100%. "
          text run at (605,0) width 141: "In IE, this causes B2 to"
          text run at (0,20) width 728: "stretch to fill the entire height of cell A2, while in Netscape 6 / Gecko, it seems to have no impact on the height of cell A2."
